00071 class DOF {
00072   friend class Robot;
00073 
00074 public:
00075   enum Type{RIGID, BREAKAWAY, COMPLIANT};
00076 
00077 protected:
00079   Robot *owner;
00080

00086

00150

00160   virtual Type getType() const = 0;
00162   virtual void reset() = 0;
00163 
00164   //------------------- STATICS ----------------------
00171   virtual bool accumulateMove(double q1, double *jointVals, int *stoppedJoints) = 0;
00175   virtual void updateFromJointValues(const double *jointVals = NULL) = 0;
00178   virtual void updateVal(double q1) = 0;
00181   virtual void getJointValues(double *jointVals) const = 0;
00186   virtual bool computeStaticJointTorques(double *jointTorques, double dofForce = -1) = 0;
00188   virtual double getStaticRatio(Joint *j) const = 0;
00189 
00190   //------------------- DYNAMICS ---------------------

00195                                                                                         double* H, double *g, int &hcn) = 0;

00200                                                                                            double* Nu, double *eps, int &ncn) = 0;

00203

00206

00209 
00211   virtual bool dynamicsProgress();

00214   virtual bool writeToStream(QTextStream &stream);
00216   virtual bool readFromStream(QTextStream &stream);
00218   virtual bool readParametersFromStream(QTextStream &stream);
00219 
00221   double getVal() const {return q;}
00223   int getDOFNum() const {return dofNum;}
00225   double getMax() const { return maxq;}
00227   double getMin() const { return minq;}
00228 
00230   double getDesiredVelocity() const {return desiredVelocity;}

00247 
00249   double getSetPoint() const {return setPoint;}
00250   double getDesiredPos() const {return desiredq;}
00251   void updateSetPoint();
00252   void setDesiredPos(double p) {desiredq = MIN(maxq,MAX(minq,p));}
00253   void setDesiredVelocity(double v) {desiredVelocity = v;}
00254   void setDefaultVelocity(double v) {defaultVelocity = v;}
00255   void setTrajectory(double *traj,int numPts);
00256   void addToTrajectory(double *traj,int numPts);

00262 class RigidDOF : public DOF 
00263 {
00264 private:
00266         double getClosestJointLimit(int *direction);
00267 public:
00268         RigidDOF() : DOF() {}
00269         RigidDOF(RigidDOF *original) : DOF(original) {}
00270         Type getType() const {return RIGID;}
00271 
00272     //------------------- STATICS ---------------------
00274         virtual bool accumulateMove(double q1, double *jointVals, int *stoppedJoints);
00276         virtual void updateFromJointValues(const double *jointVals = NULL);
00278         virtual void updateVal(double q1){q = q1;}
00280         virtual void reset(){}
00282         virtual double getStaticRatio(Joint *j) const;
00284         virtual void getJointValues(double *jointVals) const;
00286 
00289         virtual bool computeStaticJointTorques(double*,double){return true;}
00290 
00291     //------------------- DYNAMICS ---------------------
00293         virtual int getNumLimitConstraints();
00295         virtual void buildDynamicLimitConstraints(std::map<Body*,int> &islandIndices, int numBodies, 
00296                                                                                           double* H, double *g, int &hcn);
00298         virtual int getNumCouplingConstraints(){return jointList.size() - 1;}
00300         virtual void buildDynamicCouplingConstraints(std::map<Body*,int> &islandIndices, int numBodies, 
00301                                                                                              double* Nu, double *eps, int &ncn);
00303         virtual void setForce(double f);
00304 };

00323 class BreakAwayDOF : public RigidDOF
00324 {
00325 private:
00327         int *mInBreakAway;
00329         double *mBreakAwayValues;
00331         double mBreakAwayTorque;
00332 
00333 public:
00334         Type getType()const {return BREAKAWAY;}
00335         BreakAwayDOF() : RigidDOF(), mInBreakAway(NULL), mBreakAwayValues(NULL),mBreakAwayTorque(0.0) {}
00336         BreakAwayDOF(BreakAwayDOF *original) : RigidDOF(original), mInBreakAway(NULL), 
00337                                                                                    mBreakAwayValues(NULL), 
00338                                                                                    mBreakAwayTorque(original->mBreakAwayTorque) {}
00339         ~BreakAwayDOF();
00340 
00342         void initDOF(Robot *myRobot,const std::list<Joint *>& jList);
00344         virtual bool accumulateMove(double q1, double *jointVals, int *stoppedJoints);
00346         virtual void updateFromJointValues(const double *jointVals = NULL);
00348         virtual void updateVal(double q1);
00350         virtual void getJointValues(double *jointVals) const;
00352         virtual void reset();
00354         virtual bool computeStaticJointTorques(double *jointTorques, double dofForce = -1);
00355 
00357         virtual bool writeToStream(QTextStream &stream);
00359         virtual bool readFromStream(QTextStream &stream);  
00361         virtual bool readParametersFromStream(QTextStream &stream);
00362 };

00394         virtual bool computeStaticJointTorques(double* jointTorques, double dofForce = -1);
00396         virtual void reset(){}
00397
